meanings.definition: A person who sails or travels around the world.
meanings.sent1: The brave circumnavigator set sail to explore the globe.
meanings.sent2: The famous circumnavigator completed his journey around the world.
meanings.sent3: The curious circumnavigator discovered new lands during his voyage.
meanings.sent4: She was a true circumnavigator, navigating the vast oceans with skill.
meanings.sent5: The determined circumnavigator faced storms and challenges on the high seas.

meanings.definition: To sail or travel around the world.
meanings.sent1: They planned to circumnavigate the globe by becoming circumnavigators.
meanings.sent2: The sailors aimed to circumnavigate the world in record time.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to circumnavigate the world on a whim.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to circumnavigate the globe to fulfill her dream.
meanings.sent5: Circumnavigating the world was a daunting but exciting adventure for them.
